formulas.name: KeyFields
formulas.expression: OR(ISCHANGED({!$Record.management_level__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Sales_Segment__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Sales_Region__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Sales_Country__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Sales_Sector__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Territory__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Role_Level__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.L_1_Manager_Lookup__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.L_2_Manager_look_up__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.L3_Manager_look_up__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.LoA_Start_Date__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.LoA_End_Date__c}) )

recordLookups.name: Get_Records_for_Most_Recent_Open_Record
recordLookups.label: Get Records for Most Recent Open Record

start.filterFormula: OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Effective_StartDate__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.management_level__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Sales_Segment__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Sales_Region__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Sales_Country__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Sales_Sector__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Territory__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Role_Level__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.L_1_Manager_Lookup__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.L_2_Manager_look_up__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.L3_Manager_look_up__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.LoA_Start_Date__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.LoA_End_Date__c}) )
